name: 青云诀（Fate of Ascension）
description:
[Fight for love rather than death]
[The Most Romantic Immortal Fantasy MMORPG of 2018]

-Master ancient powers to win the favor of your love
Strive to gain ancient powers and win the favor of your love! Along your path, hold a grand wedding ceremony to show your love to all in this Immortal World.

-Fight with your friends against Immortal Lords
Create or join a guild with other players, fight against Immortal Lords and strive towards common goals!

-Carve your own path with devastating sword skills
Every time you advance, you will unlock new skills! Strategically use these devastating sword skills to carve your own path and develop your own combat styles!

-Train Holy Beats to travel across an Immortal World
Various Holy Beasts await to be adopted and trained! They will accompany you to travel across an Immortal World and become your greatest asset as you slay the bosses that await you.

-Battle to be the Champion of Azure Peak
A war that has lasted for centuries and beyond; will you be the chosen one that the prophecy foretells?
Fight your way to Azure Peak and become the Chosen One!

-Perform unstoppable combos to crush your foes
The path to immortality is full of trials. You must defeat countless foes on your path to destiny. By slaying bosses, you can loot ultimate gear and gain the power to protect your one true love!
